scripts.script:
<?php
// Purpose: Get data from a Battery Passport API
//  This script will eventually assume it is configured with a "custom" parameter that defines the API key like:
//  {"apikey":"YOURAPIKEY"}
//  At this point, however, authentication has not been setup on the remote server, so this has been commented out
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Node;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Type;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Equipment;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Attribute;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Organization;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Script;
use Joomla\CMS\Response\JsonResponse; // Used for returning data to the client.
require_once 'thinkiq_context.php';
require_once 'load_cms.php';
$context = new Context();
if (!defined('JPATHBASE')) define('JPATHBASE', dirname(__DIR__));

//Load helper script
Script::includeScript('digital_product_passport.dpphelperfunctions');

//$apikey = $context->custom_inputs->apikey;
$apikey = false;
if ((!isset($apikey) || $apikey == "") && $apikey !== false) {
    $msg = "No API key set, import script cannot run!";
    error_log($msg);
    print($msg);
    throw new Exception($msg);
}

// Find the target object to be updated
$parent = new Node($context->std_inputs->node_id);
$this_passport = strtolower($parent->relative_name);
// if (!$this_passport || $this_passport == "") {
//     //Fallback to hard-coded node
//     $parent = Node::getInstance(94758);
//     $this_passport = $parent->relative_name;
// }
echo "Updating: " . $this_passport . PHP_EOL;
$all_data = json_decode(getPassportData($apikey));
$passport_data = parseDataForThisPassport($all_data, $this_passport);
if (!$passport_data) {    
    echo("Could not find data from Passport API that matches this device name: " . $this_passport);
} else {    
    echo "Found data for: " . $this_passport . PHP_EOL;
    //Make time
    $current_time_with_millisecond = DateTime::createFromFormat('U.u', microtime(true))->format(DateTimeInterface::RFC3339_EXTENDED);
    echo "Using Time: " . $current_time_with_millisecond . PHP_EOL;

    //Add child passports, if needed
    $child_passports = $all_data->categories;
    $parent->getChildren();
    $ids_to_update = [];
    $passport_data = [];
    foreach ($child_passports as $child_pass) {
        //check if the child passport type exists in the model
        $child_name = $child_pass->name;
        $child_type_id = checkIfTypeExists($child_name);
        if ($child_type_id != false) {
            echo "found child passport type in model: " . $child_name . " with id: " . $child_type_id . PHP_EOL;
            $child_id = checkIfChildInstanceOfTypeExists($parent, $child_name);
            if (!$child_id) {
                echo "the child passport instance needs to be created" . PHP_EOL;
                $child_id = createChildInstanceOfType($parent, $child_name, $child_type_id);
            } else {
                echo "child passport instance already exists" . PHP_EOL;
            }
            array_push($ids_to_update, $child_id);
            array_push($passport_data, $child_pass);
        } else {
            echo "source data has unknown child: " . $child_name . PHP_EOL;
        }
    }
    echo PHP_EOL;
    //now update the extant child passport data
    $i = 0;
    $errorCount = 0;
    foreach ($ids_to_update as $id) {
        $child_node = Node::getInstance($id);
        echo "Updating Child Instance: " . $child_node->display_name . PHP_EOL;
        //load the attributes in the SMIP type definition
        $child_node->getAttributes();
        foreach ($child_node->attributes as $this_attr) {
            echo "Attribute: " . $this_attr->relative_name . PHP_EOL;
            //lookup attribute_definition ids from child_passport (aka category) in payload
            $new_value = getAttributeDataFromChildPassport($passport_data[$i], $this_attr->relative_name);
            if ($new_value !== false) {
                echo "Update the platform instance attribute id: " . $this_attr->id . " with value: " . $new_value . PHP_EOL;
                try {
                    updateSmipAttributeValue($this_attr, $new_value, $current_time_with_millisecond);
                } catch (Exception $ex) {
                    $errorCount++;
                    echo "ERROR UPDATING ATTRIBUTE VALUE: " . $ex . PHP_EOL;
                }
            }
            echo PHP_EOL;
        }
        $i++;
    }
    if ($errorCount > 0) {
        echo "ERRORS OCCURRED UPDATING " . $errorCount . " ATTRIBUTE(S)" . PHP_EOL;
    } else {
        echo "Data import complete!";
    }
    ///die(new JsonResponse('done'));
}
?>

<?php
// Purpose: Get data from a Battery Passport API
//  This script will eventually assume it is configured with a "custom" parameter that defines the API key like:
//  {"apikey":"YOURAPIKEY"}
//  At this point, however, authentication has not been setup on the remote server, so this has been commented out
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Node;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Script;
require_once 'thinkiq_context.php';
require_once 'load_cms.php';
$context = new Context();
if (!defined('JPATHBASE')) define('JPATHBASE', dirname(__DIR__));

//Load helper script
Script::includeScript('digital_product_passport.dpphelperfunctions');

// Find the target object to be purged of children
$parent = new Node($context->std_inputs->node_id);
$this_passport = strtolower($parent->relative_name);
if (!$this_passport || $this_passport == "") {
    //Fallback to hard-coded node
    $parent = Node::getInstance(94758);
    $this_passport = $parent->relative_name;
}
echo "Purging: " . $this_passport . PHP_EOL;
purgeChildInstances($parent);
echo "Done";
?>

script_templates.script:
<?php
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Node;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Type;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Equipment;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Attribute;
use \TiqUtilities\Model\Organization;
require_once 'thinkiq_context.php';
$context = new Context();

/* Utility Functions */
//todo: move these somewhere?
function checkIfTypeExists($type_name) {    
    $type_name=strtolower($type_name);    
    $allTypes = Type::getNodeSet("types")["set"];    
    foreach($allTypes as $aType ){        
        if (strtolower($aType->relative_name) == $type_name) {                    
            return $aType->id;        
        }    
    }    
    return false;
}

function checkIfChildInstanceOfTypeExists($parent, $child_type) {
    $children = $parent->children;    
    if (count($children) <= 0) {        
        return false;    
    } else {        
        foreach($children as $child) {            
            if (str_contains(strtolower($child->relative_name), strtolower($child_type))) {                
                return $child->id;            
            }        
        }    
    }    
    return false;
}

function createChildInstanceOfType($parent, $child_name, $child_type_id) {
    $type_node = Node::getInstance($child_type_id);
    $equipment = new Equipment();    
    $equipment->display_name = makePrettyDisplayName($child_name);    
    $equipment->description = $type_node->description;
    $equipment->type_id = $child_type_id;    
    $equipment->part_of_id = $parent->id;    
    try {        
        $equipment->save();        
        echo "Created " . $child_name . " in: " . $parent->display_name . PHP_EOL;
        return $equipment->id;    
    }    
    catch (Exception $e) {        
        die ("Could not find or create " . $child_name . " : " . $e);    
    }
}

function purgeChildInstances($parent) {
    $parent->getChildren();
    foreach($parent->children as $aChild) {
        $results[] = "Deleting node " .  $aChild->display_name . " " . $aChild->id . PHP_EOL;
        $aChild->delete();
    }
}

function updateSmipAttributeValue($this_attr, $new_value, $current_time_with_millisecond) {
    if ($this_attr->data_source == "config") {
        echo "Doing update for STATIC value..." . PHP_EOL;
        switch($this_attr->data_type) {
            case "string": {
                $this_attr->string_value = $new_value;
                break;
            }
            case "int": {
                $this_attr->int_value = $new_value;
                break;
            }
            case "float": {
                $this_attr->float_value = $new_value;
                break;
            }
        }
        $this_attr->save();
    } elseif ($this_attr->data_source == "tag" || $this_attr->data_source == "internal") {
        echo "Doing update for TIMESERIES value: " . $new_value . "..." . PHP_EOL;
        $values = [$new_value];
        $times = [$current_time_with_millisecond];
        if ($this_attr->data_type == "float" || $this_attr->data_type == "int")
            $this_attr->insertTimeSeries($values, $times);
    } else {
        echo "unknown value type " . $this_attr->data_source . PHP_EOL;
    }
    echo "Update complete!" . PHP_EOL;
}

function makePrettyDisplayName($name) {    
    $nameParts = explode("_", $name);    
    $newName = "";    
    foreach ($nameParts as $namePart) {        
        $newName .= " " . ucfirst($namePart);    
    }    
    return trim($newName);
}

function makeUnprettyRelativeName($name) {    
    $name = strtolower($name);    
    $name = str_replace(" ", "_", $name);    
    return trim($name);
}

function getAttributeDataFromChildPassport($child_pass, $attr_name) {
    $attrib_id = false;
    $attrib_value = false;
    echo "Finding definition for: " . $attr_name . PHP_EOL;
    foreach ($child_pass->attribute_definitions as $attrib_def) {
        if ($attr_name == $attrib_def->name) {
            echo " Found: " . $attrib_def->name . " with id " . $attrib_def->id . PHP_EOL;
            $attrib_id = $attrib_def->id;
            break;
        }
    }
    //use the ids to lookup the value from attributes section of the child passport payload
    if ($attrib_id) {
        echo "Now get data for " . $attrib_id . PHP_EOL;
        foreach ($child_pass->product->attributes as $attrib) {
            if ($attrib->definition == $attrib_id) {
                $attrib_value = $attrib->value;
                echo "The data value is: " . $attrib_value . PHP_EOL;
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return $attrib_value;
}

function parseDataForThisPassport($all_data, $this_passport) {    
    $this_name = makeUnprettyRelativeName($all_data->name);    
    if ($this_name == strtolower($this_passport))        
        return $all_data;    
    else {        
        echo "could not find passport with name: " . strtolower($this_name) . PHP_EOL;        
        return false;    
    }
}

function getPassportData($apikey) {
    $ch = curl_init();    
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);    
    //BACKUP static endpoint: curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://cesmii.net/blueprint.json');    
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://dev-distributor.evidenproductpass.com/api/passports/21858ea4-6c75-4236-93d5-bbc7adb6481c'); 
    if ($apikey !== false)   
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [    
        'x--api-key: ' . $apikey    
    ]);    
    $response = curl_exec($ch);    
    if(curl_error($ch)) {        
        fwrite($fp, curl_error($ch));    
    }    
    curl_close($ch);    
    $response_obj = json_decode($response);    
    $response = base64_decode($response_obj->blueprint);    
    return $response;
}
 ?>
